      • setOrderAsProcessed

        public void setOrderAsProcessed(int table,
                                IDish item)
        Specified by:
        setOrderAsProcessed in interface IRestaurant
        Parameters:
        table - The table whose orders you want to update
        item - The item you want to update Set the provided order as processed. More formally, this method sets the number of processed items to the value of the ordered items. You cannot specify the amount of processed items.
